templates.name: Quick Ab Burnout

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.notes: Control the movement, exhale at the top

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.notes: Touch floor on each side, keep feet elevated

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.notes: Keep lower back pressed to floor

templates.notes: Quick high-volume circuit for abs endurance

templates.name: Core Strength Focus

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.notes: Hold steady position, engage core, don't let hips sag

exercises.name: Dead Bug
exercises.notes: Controlled movement, keep lower back pressed down

exercises.name: Pallof Press
exercises.notes: Anti-rotation core work, resist the pull

templates.notes: Functional core strength with anti-rotation work

exercises.name: Cable Crunch
exercises.notes: Focus on ab contraction, not weight. Pull with abs, not arms

exercises.name: Weighted Russian Twist
exercises.notes: Hold plate or dumbbell, controlled rotation

exercises.name: Ab Wheel Rollout
exercises.notes: Advanced movement, keep core tight throughout

templates.name: Core Stability & Anti-Rotation

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.notes: Stack feet, keep body in straight line

exercises.name: Pallof Press
exercises.notes: Press away from anchor, resist rotation

exercises.name: Dead Bug
exercises.notes: Opposite arm and leg, maintain lower back contact

templates.notes: Focus on stability and preventing unwanted movement

templates.name: Ab Endurance Circuit

exercises.name: Bicycle Crunches
exercises.notes: Controlled rotation, bring elbow to opposite knee

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.notes: Quick alternating knees, maintain plank position

exercises.name: Flutter Kicks
exercises.notes: Small kicks, keep lower back down

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.notes: Hold for max time, maintain form

templates.notes: Higher volume circuit for building ab endurance
